++ Canaith Bard College
Bard College of [Bright Cliffs] 

Lead by Master Picker Jouri (F)

College Focus: Picking string melodies
    
Instruments can be purchased at the College's shop
    -Lute - 35g
    -Lyre - 30g
    -Viol - 2g

Graduates are given a Canaith Lyre, Instrument of The Bards - pg 176

    -if the Roc accepts, ride it back to the College
